statements: SELECT * FROM shipments WHERE shipment_id = 1
SELECT origin, destination, delivery_status FROM shipments WHERE origin = 'New York'
SELECT shipment_id, origin, destination, delivery_status FROM shipments WHERE shipment_id > 3
SELECT * FROM shipments WHERE destination = 'Los Angeles' ORDER BY shipment_id DESC
SELECT origin, delivery_status FROM shipments WHERE delivery_status = 'Delivered'
SELECT * FROM shipments WHERE delivery_status='Delivered';
SELECT origin, destination FROM shipments WHERE shipment_id = 1001;
SELECT shipment_id, delivery_status FROM shipments WHERE origin='New York' AND destination='Los Angeles';
SELECT * FROM shipments WHERE destination='Chicago' ORDER BY shipment_id DESC;
SELECT shipment_id, origin, destination FROM shipments WHERE origin LIKE 'M%' ORDER BY origin ASC, shipment_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM shipment_details;
SELECT shipment_id, origin, destination FROM shipment_details WHERE delivery_status = 'In Transit';
SELECT shipment_id, origin, destination, delivery_status FROM shipment_details ORDER BY origin ASC;
SELECT shipment_id, update_time, update_description FROM shipment_updates;
SELECT shipment_id, origin, destination, delivery_status FROM shipment_details WHERE destination LIKE 'New%';
SELECT * FROM shipment_details ORDER BY origin ASC, shipment_id DESC;
SELECT shipment_id, origin, destination, delivery_status FROM shipment_details WHERE delivery_status = 'In Transit';
SELECT s.shipment_id, s.origin, s.destination, u.update_time, u.update_description FROM shipment_details s JOIN shipment_updates u ON s.shipment_id = u.shipment_id;
SELECT shipment_id, delivery_status FROM shipment_details WHERE origin IN ('New York', 'Los Angeles') ORDER BY delivery_status;
SELECT MAX(update_time) AS latest_update_time, COUNT(shipment_id) AS total_shipments FROM shipment_updates GROUP BY update_time ORDER BY latest_update_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM shipments WHERE delivery_status='pending';
SELECT origin, destination FROM shipments ORDER BY destination DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_address FROM customers WHERE LENGTH(customer_name) > 5;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE total_cost > 1000 ORDER BY order_date ASC;
SELECT customer_name, origin, destination FROM customers INNER JOIN shipments ON customers.customer_id = shipments.id ORDER BY customer_name;
SELECT * FROM shipments WHERE delivery_status = 'Delivered';
SELECT shipment_id, SUM(total_cost) AS total_cost FROM orders GROUP BY shipment_id ORDER BY total_cost DESC;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT customer_name, customer_address, delivery_status FROM customers JOIN shipments ON customers.customer_id = shipments.id WHERE destination = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM shipments WHERE origin = 'Los Angeles' AND delivery_status <> 'Delivered';
SELECT * FROM shipments;
SELECT id, origin, destination FROM shipments WHERE delivery_status = 'Delivered';
SELECT name, email FROM carriers WHERE phone LIKE '%123%';
SELECT plate_number, model FROM vehicles WHERE capacity > 10 ORDER BY plate_number DESC;
SELECT id, name FROM drivers WHERE email IS NOT NULL AND phone IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM shipments WHERE delivery_status = 'In Transit';
SELECT id, origin, destination FROM shipments WHERE origin LIKE 'New%';
SELECT name, phone, email FROM carriers ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT plate_number, model, capacity FROM vehicles WHERE capacity >= 500 ORDER BY capacity DESC;
SELECT id, name, phone, email FROM drivers WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM delivery_agents;
SELECT shipment_id, origin, destination, delivery_status FROM shipment;
SELECT history_id, shipment_id, event_type, event_description, event_timestamp FROM shipment_history ORDER BY event_timestamp DESC;
SELECT agent_name, vehicle_type, contact_number FROM delivery_agents WHERE vehicle_type='Truck';
SELECT item_id, shipment_id, item_name, quantity FROM shipment_items WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT * FROM shipment;
SELECT origin, destination FROM shipment WHERE delivery_status = 'Pending';
SELECT shipment_id, item_name, quantity FROM shipment_items ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT event_type, event_description, event_timestamp FROM shipment_history WHERE event_type = 'Delivered' ORDER BY event_timestamp DESC;
SELECT agent_name, contact_number, vehicle_type FROM delivery_agents WHERE agent_id IN (1, 3, 5);
